name: King Tiger Slots: Jungle Jackpot Pop Las Vegas
name_original: King Tiger Slots: Jungle Jackpot Pop Las Vegas
description:
Love to win at slots? Enjoy this exotic thrilling adventure
slot machine game. King Tiger Slots is a completely free and addictive slots machine game for your iPhone, iPad, and iPod device.

Key Features:
>Free credits every few hours
>Hit it Rich Lucky bonus games
>Awesome graphics
>Fun like Vegas
>Endless slot machine casino entertainment!

Try out this fun and addictive slot machine game and win the huge jackpot! 100% Completely FREE to play and no in app purchases needed.
publishers: Fortune Wheel of Slot Machine Games
